grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 秋沙【アイサ】merganser (any duck of genus Mergus)
海秋沙【ウミアイサ】red-breasted merganser
砂丘【サキュウ】sand dune, sand hill
恒河沙【ゴウガシャ】10^52 (or 10^56), innumerable
kun reading compounds: 砂【すな】sand, grit, gold dust, silver dust
皿鉢【さわち】platter, serving plate, crown of the head, flower arrangement in a shallow vase, using sand
